Title: Mean Girls
Overview: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.
Keywords: female friendship, high school, fish out of water, best friend, teenager, popularity, gossip, teen comedy, high school rivalry, new girl at school
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Broadway Video, M.G. Films
Cast: Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tim Meadows
